job description:
Requisition Number 18-0329
Post Date 8/7/2018
Title Research Scientist
City Kalamazoo
State MI
Company Genesis PharmOptima, LLC
Description

Genesis PharmOptima, a member of Genesis Drug Discovery and Development Services LLC, has an immediate opening for a
Research Scientist, ADME/DMPK. PharmOptima is a proven provider of ADME/DMPK, Bioanalysis, and Biochemistry research services to the biotechnology and pharmaceutical industries. We are seeking a motivated and talented Research Scientist to
play a central role in our Bioanalytical Department.

Responsibilities:
  • Immunoassay development on the MSD platform (includes reagent identification and evaluation)
  • Run ELISA assays
  • Ligand binding assay development
  • Cell culture
  • Equipment calibration and maintenance and SOP’s
  • Shipping and receiving (includes sample receipt)
  • Ordering and maintaining inventory
  • Client communication
  • Data capture tabulation and QC
  • Protein assay (BCA or Bradford)
  • Report preparation
  • Sample preparation using Percellys homogenizer

Requirements

Requirements:
  • Minimum of BS in a biological sciences area
  • 2 years’ experience in nonclinical research setting preferred
  • Experience with immunoassays desirable
  • Exceptional organizational and communication skills
Please include details of any exceptional skills, specialty training, and/or certifications when applying for the position

  • Voluntary Policies (Accident, Hospital Indemnity, Critical Illness & Supplemental STD)
  • Legal Plan & Identity Theft Protection
  • 401(k) Plan
  • Paid Vacation & Holiday
  • Business Casual Environment
  • Credit Union
